title: AOHI Youth 140W GaN+ USB C Charger 100W Laptop Fast Charger PD3.1 PPS 3-Port USB C Wall Charger Power Adapter for MacBook Pro 16'', Dell XPS, iPhone 16/15 Pro Max, iPad Pro, Tablet, Chromebook, Yellow
description: PD 3.1 140W Super Fast Charging: This AOHI Youth Series140W laptop charger is integrating the latest PD3.1 protocol and 140W fast charging, it can fast-charge your MacBook Pro 16" from 0% to 56% in only 30 minutes, must be used with USB C to Magsafe 3 charging cable, not included in the package.If your laptop supports 100W maximum input, this AOHI Youth 140W is prepared with a USB A port, which allows your mobile phone and 100W maximum laptop to be charged at the same time, and the total input can be 100W + 22.5W. Such a design will bring more charging possibilities and convenience to our life
top_reviews:
[{"id":"RN8T9R40I8HFX","title":"Saved my cruise!","body":"I was told that my cruise line would not allow any power strips or extension cords on board, but that there are way too few outlets to charge all of one's devices. I found this a couple of days before leaving and I am so glad I did! There is only one plug at the desk in the cabin, so this device is now charging my Surface Pro 11, my Fitbit and my cellphone all at once. What an incredible device! I also threw in a USB C to USB adapter and a USB C to USB adapter to give me some versatility in what I charge at the same time, because my husband is also charging his devices with this, too. This is all you need for travel if you bring enough cables and USB adapters. It's a bit more expensive than other such units, but so, so worth it! Read more","asin":"B0D17RZRLG","body_html":"
I was told that my cruise line would not allow any power strips or extension cords on board, but that there are way too few outlets to charge all of one's devices. I found this a couple of days before leaving and I am so glad I did! There is only one plug at the desk in the cabin, so this device is now charging my Surface Pro 11, my Fitbit and my cellphone all at once. What an incredible device! I also threw in a USB C to USB adapter and a USB C to USB adapter to give me some versatility in what I charge at the same time, because my husband is also charging his devices with this, too. This is all you need for travel if you bring enough cables and USB adapters. It's a bit more expensive than other such units, but so, so worth it!

","link":"https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/RMVXM1FCYP15X/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B0D17RZRLG","rating":5,"date":{"raw":"Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2025","utc":"2025-06-20T00:00:00.000Z"},"profile":{"name":"Yitao Wang","link":"https://www.amazon.com/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AEKYAFOKOJ34RRBMWZH22WWBYYBA/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_gw_tr?ie=UTF8","id":"AEKYAFOKOJ34RRBMWZH22WWBYYBA"},"vine_program":false,"verified_purchase":true,"review_country":"us","is_global_review":false,"review_attributes":[{"Color":"Yellow"}]},{"id":"R1UXUX82W1266T","title":"A Compact Powerhouse for All Your Devices","body":"If you're looking for a charger that combines power, portability, and versatility, the AOHI 140W USB-C Charger is an excellent choice. After using it for a couple of weeks, I can confidently say it lives up to the hype. Key Features and Performance Exceptional Charging Power: With 140W of output, this charger is a beast. It effortlessly powers my MacBook Pro at full speed, even when I’m running heavy tasks like video editing and rendering. It’s also compatible with other high-powered devices like the Dell XPS, Chromebook, and even certain gaming laptops. Compact and Travel-Friendly: Despite its power, the charger is surprisingly small and lightweight compared to Apple’s OEM 140W charger. This makes it perfect for travel or carrying in your tech bag without adding bulk. Wide Compatibility: The AOHI 140W charger supports USB-C PD 3.1, meaning it works seamlessly with smartphones, tablets, laptops, and even portable power stations. I tested it with my iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPad Air, and MacBook, and it handled them all flawlessly. Smart and Safe Charging: AOHI includes advanced safety features like temperature monitoring, overvoltage protection, and current regulation. Even after long charging sessions, the adapter stays relatively cool, which gives me peace of mind. What Stands Out Fast-Charging Capabilities: It charged my MacBook Pro from 0% to 50% in just under 30 minutes—a lifesaver for someone always on the go. Sleek Design: The matte black finish and compact design give it a premium look and feel. The foldable prongs are an excellent addition for portability. Value for Money: At a fraction of the price of Apple’s 140W adapter, this charger offers superior performance and versatility without compromising quality. Minor Downsides If I had to nitpick, the charger doesn’t come with a USB-C cable, so you’ll need to buy one separately if you don’t already have one. However, given its price and performance, this is hardly a dealbreaker. Conclusion The AOHI 140W USB-C Charger is an outstanding choice for anyone in need of a powerful, reliable, and portable charging solution. Whether you’re a MacBook Pro user or simply looking for a future-proof charger for your tech arsenal, this product delivers in every way. Pros: High-speed charging for laptops, tablets, and phones. Compact and lightweight design. Advanced safety features. Cons: No included USB-C cable. Final Verdict: If you’re tired of bulky, overpriced chargers, give this one a try—you won’t be disappointed! If you're looking for a charger that combines power, portability, and versatility, the AOHI 140W USB-C Charger is an excellent choice. After using it for a couple of weeks, I can confidently say it lives up to the hype.

Key Features and Performance
Exceptional Charging Power:
With 140W of output, this charger is a beast. It effortlessly powers my MacBook Pro at full speed, even when I’m running heavy tasks like video editing and rendering. It’s also compatible with other high-powered devices like the Dell XPS, Chromebook, and even certain gaming laptops.
Compact and Travel-Friendly:
Despite its power, the charger is surprisingly small and lightweight compared to Apple’s OEM 140W charger. This makes it perfect for travel or carrying in your tech bag without adding bulk.
Wide Compatibility:
The AOHI 140W charger supports USB-C PD 3.1, meaning it works seamlessly with smartphones, tablets, laptops, and even portable power stations. I tested it with my iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPad Air, and MacBook, and it handled them all flawlessly.
Smart and Safe Charging:
AOHI includes advanced safety features like temperature monitoring, overvoltage protection, and current regulation. Even after long charging sessions, the adapter stays relatively cool, which gives me peace of mind.
What Stands Out
Fast-Charging Capabilities:
It charged my MacBook Pro from 0% to 50% in just under 30 minutes—a lifesaver for someone always on the go.
Sleek Design:
The matte black finish and compact design give it a premium look and feel. The foldable prongs are an excellent addition for portability.
Value for Money:
At a fraction of the price of Apple’s 140W adapter, this charger offers superior performance and versatility without compromising quality.
Minor Downsides
If I had to nitpick, the charger doesn’t come with a USB-C cable, so you’ll need to buy one separately if you don’t already have one. However, given its price and performance, this is hardly a dealbreaker.

Conclusion
The AOHI 140W USB-C Charger is an outstanding choice for anyone in need of a powerful, reliable, and portable charging solution. Whether you’re a MacBook Pro user or simply looking for a future-proof charger for your tech arsenal, this product delivers in every way.

Pros:

High-speed charging for laptops, tablets, and phones.
Compact and lightweight design.
Advanced safety features.
Cons:

No included USB-C cable.
Final Verdict: If you’re tired of bulky, overpriced chargers, give this one a try—you won’t be disappointed!
Read more
